attributes.action: Theresa May to Stand Down as Prime Minister -
attributes.background:
An unelected prime minister - who has shown immensely weak leadership and the sheer arrogance displayed by her and her government -  shaming the values of basic humanity- on her failure too condemn Donald Trump in the strongest terms for his Refugee & Muslim Ban. 

#NotInOurName

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
